body_html:
Also hit this and expunge also resolved it for me. I do not have clang installed on my system and have never symlinked gcc to it. Note that I did have gcc aliased as:

alias gcc='gcc -fdiagnostics-color=auto -Wall -Wextra -pedantic -std=c99'

but those are all valid gcc options. @mhlopko sure this isn't a bug in bazel?

One additional thing I should note: I did switch from a checkout of v1.11.0 to master, but don't see why that would affect the generated toolchain

body:
Also hit this and expunge also resolved it for me.  I do not have clang installed on my system and have never symlinked gcc to it.  Note that I did have gcc aliased as:

`alias gcc='gcc -fdiagnostics-color=auto -Wall -Wextra -pedantic -std=c99'`

but those are all valid gcc options.  @mhlopko sure this isn't a bug in bazel?

One additional thing I should note:  I did switch from a checkout of `v1.11.0` to `master`, but don't see why that would affect the generated toolchain
